1: וְאִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>woman</n> אַחַ֣ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>a certain</n> מִנְּשֵׁ֣י <sup>802 </sup> <n>of the wives</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> הַ֠נְּבִיאִים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n> צָעֲקָ֨ה <sup>6817 </sup> <n>Now there cried</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>unto Elisha</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> עַבְדְּךָ֤ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>Thy servant</n> אִישִׁי֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>my husband</n> מֵ֔ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>is dead</n> וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> יָדַ֔עְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and thou knowest</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> עַבְדְּךָ֔ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>that thy servant</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יָרֵ֖א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>feared</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְהַ֨נֹּשֶׁ֔ה <sup>5383 </sup> <n>and the creditor</n> בָּ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>is come</n> לָקַ֜חַת <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to take</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁנֵ֧י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>unto him my two</n> יְלָדַ֛י <sup>3206 </sup> <n>sons</n> ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>to be bondmen</n>
2: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלֶ֤יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֱלִישָׁע֙ <sup>477 </sup> <n>And Elisha</n> מָ֣ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>to her What</n> אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto her What shall I do</n> לָּ֔ךְ הַגִּ֣ידִי <sup>5046 </sup> <n>for thee? tell</n> לִ֔י מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> יֶּשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>me what hast</n> [לְכִי כ] (לָ֖ךְ ק) בַּבָּ֑יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>hath not any thing in the house</n> וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> לְשִׁפְחָתְךָ֥ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>Thine handmaid</n> כֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>in</n> בַּבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> אָס֥וּךְ <sup>610 </sup> <n>save a pot</n> שָֽׁמֶן׃ <sup>8081 </sup> <n>of oil</n>
3: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then he said</n> לְכִ֨י <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> שַׁאֲלִי־ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>borrow</n> לָ֤ךְ כֵּלִים֙ <sup>3627 </sup> <n>thee vessels</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הַח֔וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>abroad</n> מֵאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> [שִׁכְנָכֵי כ] (שְׁכֵנָ֑יִךְ <sup>7934 </sup> <n>inhabitant</n> ק) כֵּלִ֥ים <sup>3627 </sup> <n>vessels</n> רֵקִ֖ים <sup>7386 </sup> <n>[even] empty</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּמְעִֽיטִי׃ <sup>4591 </sup> <n>borrow not a few</n>
4: וּבָ֗את <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when thou art come in</n> וְסָגַ֤רְתְּ <sup>5462 </sup> <n>thou shalt shut</n> הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the door</n> בַּעֲדֵ֣ךְ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>behind</n> וּבְעַד־ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>behind</n> בָּנַ֔יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>upon thee and upon thy sons</n> וְיָצַ֕קְתְּ <sup>3332 </sup> <n>and shalt pour out</n> עַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>out</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַכֵּלִ֖ים <sup>3627 </sup> <n>into all those vessels</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וְהַמָּלֵ֖א <sup>4392 </sup> <n>that which is full</n> תַּסִּֽיעִי׃ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>and thou shalt set aside</n>
5: וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> מֵֽאִתּ֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַתִּסְגֹּ֣ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>from him and shut</n> הַדֶּ֔לֶת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the door</n> בַּעֲדָ֖הּ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>upon her and upon</n> וּבְעַ֣ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>behind</n> בָּנֶ֑יהָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>her sons</n> הֵ֛ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>who</n> מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <sup>5066 </sup> <n>brought</n> אֵלֶ֖יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְהִ֥יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> [מֵיצָקֶת כ] (מֹוצָֽקֶת׃ <sup>3332 </sup> <n>cast</n> ק)
6: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּמְלֹ֣את <sup>4390 </sup> <n>were full</n> הַכֵּלִ֗ים <sup>3627 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the vessels</n> וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that she said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> בְּנָהּ֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto her son</n> הַגִּ֨ישָׁה <sup>5066 </sup> <n>Bring</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>another</n> כֶּ֔לִי <sup>3627 </sup> <n>me yet a vessel</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלֶ֔יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n> כֶּ֑לִי <sup>3627 </sup> <n>unto her [There is] not a vessel</n> וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stayed</n> הַשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <sup>8081 </sup> <n>more And the oil</n>
7: וַתָּבֹ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>Then she came</n> וַתַּגֵּד֙ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and told</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לְכִי֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> מִכְרִ֣י <sup>4376 </sup> <n>sell</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>the oil</n> וְשַׁלְּמִ֖י <sup>7999 </sup> <n>and pay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> [נִשְׁיֵכִי כ] (נִשְׁיֵ֑ךְ <sup>5386 </sup> <n>debt</n> ק) וְאַ֣תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> [בְּנֵיכִי כ] (וּבָנַ֔יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> ק) תִֽחְיִ֖י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and live</n> בַּנּוֹתָֽר׃ <sup>3498 </sup> <n>of the rest</n> פ
8: וַיְהִ֨י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> הַיּ֜וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it fell on a day</n> וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>passed</n> אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>that Elisha</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שׁוּנֵ֗ם <sup>7766 </sup> <n>to Shunem</n> וְשָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>where</n> אִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>woman</n> גְדוֹלָ֔ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>where [was] a great</n> וַתַּחֲזֶק־ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and she constrained</n> בּ֖וֹ לֶאֱכָל־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>him to eat</n> לָ֑חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> מִדֵּ֣י <sup>1767 </sup> <n>And [so] it was [that] as oft</n> עָבְר֔וֹ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>as he passed by</n> יָסֻ֥ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>he turned</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לֶאֱכָל־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>in thither to eat</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n>
9: וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> אִישָׁ֔הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto her husband</n> הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> יָדַ֔עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Behold now I perceive</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> קָד֣וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>that this [is] an holy</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>this</n> עֹבֵ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>which passeth</n> עָלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תָּמִֽיד׃ <sup>8548 </sup> <n>by us continually</n>
10: נַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Let us make</n> נָּ֤א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> עֲלִיַּת־ <sup>5944 </sup> <n>chamber</n> קִיר֙ <sup>7023 </sup> <n>I pray thee on the wall</n> קְטַנָּ֔ה <sup>6996 </sup> <n>a little</n> וְנָשִׂ֨ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and let us set</n> ל֥וֹ שָׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מִטָּ֥ה <sup>4296 </sup> <n>for him there a bed</n> וְשֻׁלְחָ֖ן <sup>7979 </sup> <n>and a table</n> וְכִסֵּ֣א <sup>3678 </sup> <n>and a stool</n> וּמְנוֹרָ֑ה <sup>4501 </sup> <n>and a candlestick</n> וְהָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְּבֹא֥וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and it shall be when he cometh</n> אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to us</n> יָס֥וּר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>to us that he shall turn</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
11: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הַיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it fell on a day</n> וַיָּ֣בֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>that he came</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וַיָּ֥סַר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>thither and he turned</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעֲלִיָּ֖ה <sup>5944 </sup> <n>into the chamber</n> וַיִּשְׁכַּב־ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and lay</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>

13: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> ל֗וֹ אֱמָר־ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him Say</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> אֵלֶיהָ֮ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> חָרַ֣דְתְּ ׀ <sup>2729 </sup> <n>now unto her Behold thou hast been careful</n> אֵלֵינוּ֮ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַחֲרָדָ֣ה <sup>2731 </sup> <n>for us with all this care</n> הַזֹּאת֒ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> מֶ֚ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>what [is] to be done</n> לָ֔ךְ הֲיֵ֤שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>for thee? wouldest</n> לְדַבֶּר־ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>thou be spoken</n> לָךְ֙ אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>for to the king</n> א֖וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שַׂ֣ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>or to the captain</n> הַצָּבָ֑א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>appointed time</n> וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Say</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>mine own people</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יֹשָֽׁבֶת׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>I dwell</n>

And Gehazi</n> אֲבָ֛ל <sup>61 </sup> <n>Verily</n> בֵּ֥ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>she hath no child</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> לָ֖הּ וְאִישָׁ֥הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and her husband</n> זָקֵֽן׃ <sup>2204 </sup> <n>is old</n>

17: וַתַּ֥הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>conceived</n> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>And the woman</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בֵּ֑ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n> לַמּוֹעֵ֤ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>at that season</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n> כָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>unto her according to the time</n> חַיָּ֔ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of life</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> דִּבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>had said</n> אֵלֶ֖יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>as</n> אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <sup>477 </sup> <n>that Elisha</n>

27: וַתָּבֹ֞א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when she came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the man</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָהָ֔ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>to the hill</n> וַֽתַּחֲזֵ֖ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>she caught</n> בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <sup>7272 </sup> <n>him by the feet</n> וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>came near</n> גֵּֽיחֲזִ֜י <sup>1522 </sup> <n>but Gehazi</n> לְהָדְפָ֗הּ <sup>1920 </sup> <n>to thrust her away</n> וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> הַרְפֵּֽה־ <sup>7503 </sup> <n>Let her alone</n> לָהּ֙ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נַפְשָׁ֣הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for her soul</n> מָֽרָה־ <sup>4843 </sup> <n>[is] vexed</n> לָ֔הּ וַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> הֶעְלִ֣ים <sup>5956 </sup> <n>hath hid</n> מִמֶּ֔נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הִגִּ֖יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>[it] from me and hath not told</n> לִֽי׃

34: וַיַּ֜עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>And he went up</n> וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and lay</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַיֶּ֗לֶד <sup>3206 </sup> <n>upon the child</n> וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and put</n> פִּ֨יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>his mouth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> פִּ֜יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>upon his mouth</n> וְעֵינָ֤יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and his eyes</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עֵינָיו֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>upon his eyes</n> וְכַפָּ֣יו <sup>3709 </sup> <n>and his hands</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> [כַּפֹּו כ] (כַּפָּ֔יו <sup>3709 </sup> <n>and his hands</n> ק) וַיִּגְהַ֖ר <sup>1457 </sup> <n>and he stretched</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וַיָּ֖חָם <sup>2552 </sup> <n>waxed warm</n> בְּשַׂ֥ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>himself upon the child and the flesh</n> הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <sup>3206 </sup> <n>of the child</n>

36: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And he called</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> גֵּיחֲזִ֗י <sup>1522 </sup> <n>Gehazi</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> קְרָא֙ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Call</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַשֻּׁנַמִּ֣ית <sup>7767 </sup> <n>this Shunammite</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>he</n> וַיִּקְרָאֶ֖הָ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>So he called</n> וַתָּב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>her And when she was come in</n> אֵלָ֑יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him he said</n> שְׂאִ֥י <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Take up</n> בְנֵֽךְ׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy son</n>
37: וַתָּבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Then she went in</n> וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and fell</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> רַגְלָ֔יו <sup>7272 </sup> <n>at his feet</n> וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and bowed</n> אָ֑רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>herself to the ground</n> וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and took up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנָ֖הּ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>her son</n> וַתֵּצֵֽא׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went out</n> פ
38: וֶאֱלִישָׁ֞ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>And Elisha</n> שָׁ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>came again</n> הַגִּלְגָּ֙לָה֙ <sup>1537 </sup> <n>to Gilgal</n> וְהָרָעָ֣ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>and [there was] a dearth</n> בָּאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> וּבְנֵי֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the sons</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n> יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[were] sitting</n> לְפָנָ֑יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and he said</n> לְנַעֲר֗וֹ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>unto his servant</n> שְׁפֹת֙ <sup>8239 </sup> <n>Set</n> הַסִּ֣יר <sup>5518 </sup> <n>pot</n> הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>on the great</n> וּבַשֵּׁ֥ל <sup>1310 </sup> <n>and seethe</n> נָזִ֖יד <sup>5138 </sup> <n>pottage</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the sons</n> הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n>
39: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> אֶחָ֣ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>And one</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַשָּׂדֶה֮ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>into the field</n> לְלַקֵּ֣ט <sup>3950 </sup> <n>to gather</n> אֹרֹת֒ <sup>219 </sup> <n>herbs</n> וַיִּמְצָא֙ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and found</n> גֶּ֣פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>vine</n> שָׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>a wild</n> וַיְלַקֵּ֥ט <sup>3950 </sup> <n>and gathered</n> מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> פַּקֻּעֹ֥ת <sup>6498 </sup> <n>gourds</n> שָׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>thereof wild</n> מְלֹ֣א <sup>4393 </sup> <n>full</n> בִגְד֑וֹ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his lap</n> וַיָּבֹ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> וַיְפַלַּ֛ח <sup>6398 </sup> <n>and shred</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> סִ֥יר <sup>5518 </sup> <n>[them] into the pot</n> הַנָּזִ֖יד <sup>5138 </sup> <n>of pottage</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדָֽעוּ׃ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>for they knew</n>
40: וַיִּֽצְק֥וּ <sup>3332 </sup> <n>So they poured out</n> לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>O [thou] man</n> לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to eat</n> וַ֠יְהִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and as they</n> כְּאָכְלָ֨ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>And it came to pass as they were eating</n> מֵהַנָּזִ֜יד <sup>5138 </sup> <n>of the pottage</n> וְהֵ֣מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> צָעָ֗קוּ <sup>6817 </sup> <n>that they cried out</n> וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מָ֤וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>[there is] death</n> בַּסִּיר֙ <sup>5518 </sup> <n>in the pot</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and they</n> יָכְל֖וּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>And they could</n> לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>not eat</n>
41: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>But he said</n> וּקְחוּ־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Then bring</n> קֶ֔מַח <sup>7058 </sup> <n>meal</n> וַיַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>And he cast</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַסִּ֑יר <sup>5518 </sup> <n>[it] into the pot</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and he said</n> צַ֤ק <sup>3332 </sup> <n>Pour out</n> לָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for the people</n> וְיֹאכֵ֔לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that they may eat</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> הָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> דָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>act</n> רָ֖ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>adversity</n> בַּסִּֽיר׃ <sup>5518 </sup> <n>in the pot</n> ס
42: וְאִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> בָּ֜א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And there came</n> מִבַּ֣עַל שָׁלִ֗שָׁה <sup>1190 </sup> <n>from Baalshalisha</n> וַיָּבֵא֩ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and brought</n> לְאִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> לֶ֤חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> בִּכּוּרִים֙ <sup>1061 </sup> <n>of the firstfruits</n> עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <sup>6242 </sup> <n>twenty</n> לֶ֣חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>loaves</n> שְׂעֹרִ֔ים <sup>8184 </sup> <n>of barley</n> וְכַרְמֶ֖ל <sup>3759 </sup> <n>and full ears of corn</n> בְּצִקְלֹנ֑וֹ <sup>6861 </sup> <n>in the husk</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>thereof And he said</n> תֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> לָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> וְיֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that they may eat</n>
43: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> מְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <sup>8334 </sup> <n>And his servitor</n> מָ֚ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> אֶתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>What should I set</n> זֶ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>this before</n> מֵ֣אָה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>an hundred</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>he</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>for thus saith</n> תֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> לָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> וְיֹאכֵ֔לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that they may eat</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כֹ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֛ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>says</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אָכֹ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>They shall eat</n> וְהוֹתֵֽר׃ <sup>3498 </sup> <n>and shall leave</n>
